content: What would be the process for adding a new reg type to nvptx (cuda) inline assembly? Currently we have reg32 and reg64 which are .b32 and .b64 regs, however, OptiX complains if you do not use float regs for certain things (i managed to work around it with a hack but its that, a hack). So i would like to add freg32 and freg64. LLVM supports it just fine AFAIK.
nevermind i seem to have figured it out, i will submit a pr soon
Riccardo D'Ambrosio has marked this topic as resolved.
